@Manifest.Section

Package ball.upnp

Classes specific to Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) (moved to https://openconnectivity.org/developer/specifications/upnp-resources/upnp-developer-resources).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnnotatedDevice
    Device support for DeviceType and related annotations.
    AnnotatedService
    Service support for ServiceType and related annotations.
    Description
    Description support for XmlNs annotation.
    Device
    UPnP device interface.
    RootDevice
    UPnP RootDevice interface.
    Service
    UPnP service interface.
    SSDP
    SSDP "discoverable" marker interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDevice
    Abstract base class for UPnP Devices.
    AbstractService
    Abstract base class for UPnP Services.
    Action
    Action.
    Argument
    Argument.
    Icon
    Icon.
    StateVariable
    StateVariable.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AllowedValue
    StateVariable AllowedValues.
    Direction
    Argument Directions.

Package ball.upnp Description

Classes specific to Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) (moved to https://openconnectivity.org/developer/specifications/upnp-resources/upnp-developer-resources). 
<dependency>
  <groupId>ball</groupId>
  <artifactId>ball-upnp</artifactId>
  <version>3.0.2.20210415</version>
</dependency>
Author:
Allen D. Ball
